sentences.en: ...while out cycling one evening and listening to your programme on headphones.
sentences.cn: …一天晚上在外面一边骑车一边戴着耳机收听你的节目时。

sentences.en: "White noise" was played into the subject's ears through headphones.
sentences.cn: 让受试者通过耳机听“白噪声”。

sentences.en: Built - in stereo speakers, you can add headphones, a microphone input.
sentences.cn: 内 置 立体声喇叭, 可以外接耳机, 麦克风输入.

sentences.en: Check if headphones are connected. If they re, disconnect them.
sentences.cn: 检查是否接插着耳机.如果是, 即将其拆卸下来.

sentences.en: Excuse me. Do you want headphones for the movie?
sentences.cn: 空中小姐:请问, 你们要看电影的耳机 吗 ?

sentences.en: I am using Nokia also the machine, you are equipped with headphones.
sentences.cn: 我现在用的也是诺基亚机子, 有配耳机呀.

sentences.en: I carefully threaded the tape and placed the headphones on.
sentences.cn: 我小心地装好磁带,戴上了耳机.

sentences.en: I refused to wear headphones because they can perforate your eardrums.
sentences.cn: 我不愿戴耳机，因为它可能会使鼓膜穿孔。

sentences.en: Josh Powell grabs his headphones and heads for the players - only lounge.
sentences.cn: 约什-鲍威尔正紧紧攥住耳机,向球员休息室走去.

sentences.en: May I have headphones for the in - flight movie?
sentences.cn: 我可以要一副耳机来欣赏飞机上的电影 吗 ?

sentences.en: One hundred and forty quid for a pair of headphones, you've got to be joking!
sentences.cn: 一副耳机140英镑，你不是在开玩笑吧！

sentences.en: The speaker is deactivated when you connect the headphones.
sentences.cn: 连接耳机后,扬声器便不会发出声音.

sentences.en: The tape machines will run pre - recorded lessons which pupils will follow by headphones.
sentences.cn: 录音机将播放事先录制好的课程,学生们可以通过耳机收听.

sentences.en: These headphones also utilize UHPLC copper in the connecting cable.
sentences.cn: 这些耳机还采用UHPLC铜连接电缆.

sentences.en: To test your speakers or headphones, speak into the microphone.
sentences.cn: 要测试您的扬声器或耳机, 请对着麦克风讲话.

sentences.en: Use headphones if you'll be listening to them in workday.
sentences.cn: 你在工作中听音乐的话,最好使用耳机.

words.tran_cn: 耳机；听筒；头戴式受话器（headphone的复数形式）

trans.tran_cn: 耳机，听筒，头戴式受话器
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that you wear over your ears to listen to the radio, music etc without other people hearing it
